== PyMCT Types (Convenience) ==

Within the main _CPL_ package the following files wrap the MCT types exposed by Babel to make them a bit
easier to manipulate, and to prevent and handle common errors.

 * cpl/attributevector.py
 * cpl/domain.py
 * cpl/map.py
